Html:
I have a project that requires a gantt chart and I'd like to use the WPF Toolkit.   Can anyone tell me does the BarSeries chart support this or is there another way?   If anyone has any information about this I would really appreciate it.  Thanks.

 

Johnny Mack

If you are using VS2008 the Forms chart controls work like any other forms control in WPF. I have successfully used them.

http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyId=1D69CE13-E1E5-4315-825C-F14D33A303E9&displaylang=en
